thread.section_title: OneSimCard Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of OneSimCard | www.onesimcard.com
thread.title: Gordon

author: Gordon
title: Gordon
text: When my daughter went away for Denmark to study abroad for a year, I looked for all sorts of options and sending a US based cell phone was unaffordable. I found OneSimcard and with an old flip phone found on eBay, it worked great. The PEN was a god send and made it easy for us to stay in touch. Since then, I have travelled all over Europe including Russia, the Baltic, Italy, the UK , Mexico and the Caribbean and never had a problem. I highly recommend this as an affordable option for any international travel and having the US based PEN is a great option!!
